snippet: The market sagged over all with the price of oil, but consumer stocks were led higher by Priceline, which reported better-than-forecast earnings.
abstract: Stocks of utility companies fall, bringing market down slightly.
lead_paragraph: The market sagged over all with the price of oil, but consumer stocks were led higher by Priceline, which reported better-than-forecast earnings.

headline.main: Slide in Utility Companies Nudges the Market Down
headline.print_headline: Markets Fall on Slide in Utility Companies
